overview: Join Tony Hawk and his company of high-flyin' (and high-falutin') skateboard maestros as they take you through some skating tips and tricks that will leave you open-mouthed in amazement! Highlights include Burnquist launching a 7-foot "Ollie" and Bam leaping for a sixth-floor balcony. Say what you want about the evolution of the sport, but these guys really get air.
title: Tony Hawk's Gigantic Skatepark Tour 2001
